item.title: WDS Service: The Service did not respond in a timely fashion
item.description:
This was a new one for me. Usually WDS is rock solid and it just works. Anyway, I was getting ready to deploy some servers in my lab and found that I couldnâ€™t get WDS to start on my deployment server. I got this error message when trying to start the service:
I then tried to start the service from the Services console and got this error message:
